title: Toggle Function Block
description:
TOGGLE is a edge-triggered Toggle Flip -Flop with asynchronous reset 
input. The TOGGLE Flip Flop invertes output Q on a rising edge of CLK. The 
output changes on each rising edge of CLK his condition.
 18. Signal Generators
name: TOGGLE

input.name: CLK
input.description: Clock input signal used for toggling the output state.

input.name: rst
input.description: Reset input signal that sets the output Q to false when high.

output.name: Q
output.description: Current state of the output signal, toggled based on the CLK input.
